thread.title: Ask the over sixties: do you ever get over your first love?
thread.title_full: Ask the over sixties: do you ever get over your first love?

author: Brooke Streatfield
title: Ask the over sixties: do you ever get over your first love?
text:
T his week’s episode of ‘Ask the over sixties’ poses the question: ‘do you ever get over your first love?’
In the video above our interviewees share their thoughts on getting over your first love. Some say they are not fully over it, while others admit they have moved on with their lives.
Filmed at Age UK’s day centre in Hounslow, previous episodes in this series have focused on ‘What is the key to happiness?’ and ‘What is the secret to long term love?’ 
Our contributors were filmed at one of Age UK's many day centres across the country Credit: Telegraph F uture episodes explore other burning questions such as ‘What is the most important thing in life?’ and ‘Advice to your 30 year old self’.
This series was created with the help of Age UK, the country’s largest charity dedicated to helping everyone make the most of later life.
To find our more information about the great work Age UK are doing in your area you can visit their website. 
Watch | Ask the over sixties: what is the secret to long term love? 02:00
